artifacts.title: Recyclable means the material will be reused after product lifetime as recycled material.
artifacts.description:
Recyclable means the material will be reused after product lifetime as recycled material. 

1) Reduce the number of hybrid material

2) Avoid 2K materials

3) Avoid glued parts

4) Plastic and die cast parts are marked with the relevant material classification (e.g. PA-GF30).

See also operational Levers guideline: SBTi Levers
